title: Real-time stock update upon incoming order chat message
description: Verify that when an order chat message is detected, the stock inventory updates in real-time across all connected devices.

steps.description: Open two client devices logged into the same account with Manowzab Command Center dashboard.
Send a valid order-formatted chat message containing an item purchase from YouTube Live Chat.
Check that the stock quantity decreases correctly in the Stock Grid on both devices reflecting the order.
Verify no delay greater than 1 second from chat message reception to stock update.

title: Automated TTS announcement playback on new order
description: Confirm that the hybrid TTS system triggers playback of order summary announcements immediately when an order is processed online and falls back offline when unavailable.

steps.description: Simulate an incoming order chat message triggering order processing with TTS enabled in online mode.
Verify Google Cloud TTS playback starts within 3 seconds.
Disable internet connectivity and simulate a new order chat message.
Check that native browser TTS plays the order summary immediately after detection without error.

title: Stock Grid color-coded availability and queue display
description: Validate that the Stock Grid correctly shows color codes for availability status and displays queue counts for items that are reserved but not yet finalized.

steps.description: Manually book items using admin proxy commands or stock grid controls to generate queue reservations.
Confirm color codes on stock items accurately reflect 'in stock', 'reserved (queued)', and 'out of stock' statuses.
Check the queue count number is displayed clearly next to queued items.

title: Multi-device Firebase synchronization for stock, chat, and system state
description: Ensure all stock changes, chat messages, system toggles (like TTS, sound, away mode) are synced with under 100ms latency without data loss or duplicated messages across multiple devices.

steps.description: Open the app on three separate devices simultaneously logged into the same admin user.
Perform changes such as stock adjustments, toggle TTS mode, send chat messages, and enable away mode on one device.
Verify that all other devices update their UI to reflect these changes under 100ms with no duplicated chat or stock entries.

title: Chat panel pagination and message formatting validation
description: Verify chat panel displays up to 200 messages with correct formatting for buy/sell/shipping message types and supports loading older messages via pagination.

steps.description: Fill chat with more than 200 messages including various message types (order, cancellation, shipping, and normal chat).
Check that the newest 200 messages are displayed with appropriate highlights and buyer nickname overrides.
Use 'Load More' pagination control to fetch earlier messages.
Confirm older messages are loaded and displayed correctly maintaining formatting.

title: Sales and chat history filtering and CSV export
description: Confirm that the History Modal correctly filters sessions by date and search terms and exports complete, accurate sales data as CSV.

steps.description: Open the History Modal and set date range filters to a specific session period.
Apply text search filters to narrow down transactions.
Verify that only transactions matching criteria are displayed and sales statistics update accordingly.
Click CSV export button.
Validate the downloaded CSV contains all filtered transactions with correct fields and no data omissions.

title: iPad Safari audio unlock enabling autoplay on first interaction
description: Test that audio playback (TTS and sound effects) on iPad Safari is successfully unlocked after the user's first interaction, allowing autoplay throughout the session.

steps.description: Open the app on iPad Safari with audio playback initially locked.
Verify initially audio autoplay is blocked.
Perform any user interaction such as tapping a button to unlock audio.
Confirm subsequent TTS and sound effect playback occur without additional user interaction.

title: Sound effect playback for success and error events
description: Ensure that distinct sound effects play appropriately on successful order processing and error occurrences.

steps.description: Trigger a successful order processing event by simulating a valid chat order.
Verify that the success sound effect is played exactly once.
Trigger an error state such as stock overbooking or invalid command.
Confirm the error sound effect is played exactly once.

title: YouTube Live Chat API polling respects quota and handles errors gracefully
description: Validate that the YouTube Live Chat API polling mechanism limits request frequency to avoid quota breaches and recovers smoothly from API errors.

steps.description: Simulate continuous message polling at high frequency with YouTube API quota restrictions.
Verify polling adjusts interval dynamically to prevent exceeding quota.
Introduce artificial API error responses such as HTTP 403 or 500.
Check that errors are logged, users notified if needed, and polling resumes normally after cooldown.

title: Away mode toggle and custom away message display with visual banner
description: Confirm that toggling away mode updates system state, broadcasts custom away messages, and displays a visible banner as expected.

steps.description: Toggle away mode on via the header controls.
Validate that the custom away message is sent as a chat notification.
Confirm a banner indicating away mode is visible on all devices connected to the account.
Toggle away mode off.
Verify that the away banner is removed and normal chat operations continue.

title: Offline caching and update prompt functionality of PWA
description: Verify that the Progressive Web App caches critical assets for offline use and displays an update prompt when a new version is available.

steps.description: Load the app and verify all static resources are cached by the service worker.
Disconnect network and reload the app.
Confirm app loads successfully with cached resources and all main UI components function offline.
Deploy a new app version and reload the page.
Verify that an update prompt is displayed, allowing the user to refresh to the new version.

title: Manual booking and queue management via stock grid inputs
description: Test that admins can manually book stock items and manage queues through Stock Grid controls and that these updates reflect in real-time.

steps.description: Select a stock item in the Stock Grid and manually input a booking quantity.
Verify that the booking updates the queue count and stock availability accordingly.
Cancel part or all of the queue using stock grid controls.
Confirm the queue count and available stock adjust correctly and synchronize across devices.

title: Pull-to-refresh gesture on mobile reloads chat and stock data
description: Validate the pull-to-refresh gesture on mobile devices triggers reload of latest chat messages and stock data without errors.

steps.description: Open the app on a mobile/tablet device.
Perform pull-to-refresh gesture on the chat panel.
Verify that the chat panel reloads new chat messages and stock grid refreshes current stock status.
Confirm no duplicates or missing data occur after refresh.

title: Voice-price detection processes spoken price queries with TTS response
description: Ensure that spoken price queries on the Voice Price Page are detected accurately by speech recognition and the corresponding price information is announced using TTS.

steps.description: Navigate to the Voice Price Page and speak a valid price query for an available stock item.
Verify that speech recognition converts the spoken query into text accurately.
Confirm TTS playback announces the correct price information within 3 seconds.
Speak an invalid or unknown item query.
Check that an appropriate error or 'item not found' message is announced with TTS.

title: System reliability under high load with 500+ chat messages and 70 stock items
description: Test the application stability and UI responsiveness when handling large volumes of chat messages and extensive stock inventory without memory leaks or lag.

steps.description: Populate chat history with over 500 messages including multiple order, cancellation, and normal chat types.
Load a stock inventory of at least 70 items and perform frequent real-time stock updates.
Monitor UI responsiveness and memory usage over a 30-minute period.
Validate no UI freezing, data loss, or memory leaks occur.
